medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain for one day with associated vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began acutely at 5 AM and has been present for one day. The patient reports three episodes of vomiting. She also experienced chills at home. The pain has improved since admission, but she still has nausea and diffuse abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Schizophrenia, Obesity, Sinusitis, GERD, Uterine Fibroids
medical_history.social_history: Denies alcohol intake, drug use, or recent change in medication.
